thread.section_title: Munchery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Munchery | www.munchery.com
thread.title: Steph G.

author: Steph G.
title: Steph G.
text: Other than having a little bit of trouble ordering through the website the first time (the program would time out and make me start all over from the beginning), the quality of the food was very good, and quite tasty! My only critique so far would be the vegetable in my first order were a bit overcooked. Other than that, the salmon was delicious, the delivery was made in a timely manner, the driver was courteous and professional, and the portion size was perfect for me. For those who have really big appetites, you may want to order a side dish. I can't wait to try my next delivery, and hope the food will be just as flavorful as my first order. I will definitely be ordering from here again!
